Zend_Controller_Router_Abstract

Description
Description | Descendents | Vars (details) | Methods (details)

Implements interfaces:

  • Zend_Controller_Router_Interface

Simple first implementation of a router, to be replaced with rules-based URI processor.

		clearParams (line 133)
	
 
	
	

Clear the controller parameter stack


By default, clears all parameters. If a parameter name is given, clears  only that parameter; if an array of parameter names is provided, clears  each.

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		Zend_Controller_Router
		
			clearParams
		
					([null|string|array $name = null])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				null|string|array
				$name: single key or array of keys for params to clear			
    •
